sentences.english: Progesterone is a hormone with different actions dependent on the period in the oestrous cycle.

sentences.english: Most women have some form of morning sickness caused by pregnancy hormones.(

sentences.english: The progestational hormone of large dose controls the secrete breast function of the element that urge breast.

sentences.english: Progestational hormone. Estrogen is very low, can be this treated?
sentences.chinese: 孕激素。雌激素都很低，这能治好吗？

sentences.english: Analyses were stratified according to estrogen dose and progestogen type.
sentences.chinese: 又根据雌激素剂量和孕激素类型对分析进行了分层。

sentences.english: However, currently available data have limited the ability to investigate the wide variety of types of progestogen.

sentences.english: Aim To study the progestogen effect and activity of triphasic contraceptive tablets.

sentences.english: The process is here medium, corpus luteum begins to secrete the progestational hormone that has gravid effect.
sentences.chinese: 在此过程中，黄体开始分泌有妊娠作用的孕激素。

sentences.english: Just before and during your period, levels of progesterone and estrogen decrease.
sentences.chinese: 在经期前以及经期间，孕激素和雌性激素会减少。

sentences.english: RU486 is a steroid analogue with high affinity for progesterone and glucocorli-coid receptors.
sentences.chinese: RU486是一种新型抗孕激素催经止孕药。

definition: corpus luteum (glands in female mammals producing progesterone)
luteal phase (period in the menstrual cycle when an embryo can implant in the womb)
thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
